What do you think about teachers who frequent the bars every night??? Should they be allowed to teach our children?? Why, or why not?

What do you think about teachers who frequent the bars every night??? Should they be allowed to teach our children
 
 
 Yes they should be allowed to teach still.
 
 
Why, or why not?
 
 
 As long as the drinking is not affecting the teachers ability to teach or she is openly discussing it, I don't see a problem with it. Its not like she is drinking in front of the students.
whatever somebody does in their own time is private. if it is brought into or interferes with the job, then it is a problem.

I agree. Your private life is your business.
 I do know teachers who do that actually. They are (ironically, to some) some of the best teachers that I have. 
 Besides, I know more students that drink illegally than teachers that drink legally, so who's complaining?

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  What about teachers who drink
